content.en: Polling system analysis: Researchers have been using the power-series algorithm to analyze the behavior of multiple-server polling systems and determine optimal schedules for cyclic polling systems. This algorithm also allows for the numerical analysis of polling systems with various service disciplines and the analysis of systems with general input processes and finite capacity. Additionally, algorithms have been developed to approximate the behavior of large multi-queue single-server systems and compute probability distributions and moments in polling models.
content.da: Analyse af pollingsystemer: Forskere har brugt potensrækkemetoden til at analysere adfærden i fler-server pollingsystemer og bestemme optimale tidsplaner for cykliske pollingsystemer. Denne algoritme muliggør også numerisk analyse af pollingsystemer med forskellige betjeningsdiscipliner samt analyse af systemer med generelle inputprocesser og begrænset kapacitet. Derudover er algoritmer blevet udviklet til at estimere adfærden i store multi-kø enkelt-server systemer og beregne sandsynlighedsfordelinger og momenter i pollingmodeller.
